title: Notify-Validated-measure-data-assembly-model  profile generated 2022-02-14 11:19:38.665455
description: This package contains the model that has been assembled from the contextual model. All classes with relations [1..1] or [0..1] have had their attributes integrated into their parent class.

NotifyValidatedMeasureData_MarketDocumen.title: NotifyValidatedMeasureData_MarketDocument
NotifyValidatedMeasureData_MarketDocumen.description: Electronic document containing the information necessary to satisfy a given business process set of requirements.

mRID.description:
Master resource identifier issued by a model authority. The mRID is unique within an exchange context. Global uniqueness is easily achieved by using a UUID, as specified in RFC 4122, for the mRID. The use of UUID is strongly recommended.
For CIMXML data files in RDF syntax conforming to IEC 61970-552, the mRID is mapped to rdf:ID or rdf:about attributes that identify CIM object elements.

createdDateTime.description: Date and time that this document was created.

type.description: Utility-specific classification of this document, according to its corporate standards, practices, and existing IT systems (e.g., for management of assets, maintenance, work, outage, customers, etc.).

Point.title: Point
Point.description: An identification of a set of values beeing adressed within a specific interval of time.

position.description: A sequential value representing the relative position within a given time interval.

quality.description: The quality of the information being provided. This quality may be estimated, not available, as provided, etc.

quantity.description: Principal quantity identified for a point.

Series.title: Series
Series.description: A set of similar physical or conceptual objects defined for the same period or point of time.

marketEvaluationPoint.type.description: Specifies if the Market Evaluation Point is an Exchange Point or an Accounting Point.

product.description: The type of the product such as Power, energy, reactive power, transport capacity that is the subject of the time series.

quantity_Measure_Unit.name.description: The coded representation of the unit.

registration_DateAndOrTime.dateTime.description: Date and time as per ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ.

Series_Period.title: Series_Period
Series_Period.description: An identification of a time interval that may have a given resolution.

resolution.description: The number of units of time that compose an individual step within a period.

timeInterval.description: The start and end date and time for a given interval.

MessageKind_String.title: MessageKind_String
MessageKind_String.description: The coded type of a document.

ProcessKind_String.title: ProcessKind_String
ProcessKind_String.description: The coded identification of the nature of process.

PartyID_String.title: PartyID_String
PartyID_String.description:
The identification of an actor in the energy market.

In the ESMP context, it is an authorized issuing office that provides an agreed identification coding scheme for market participant identification.

MarketRoleKind_String.title: MarketRoleKind_String
MarketRoleKind_String.description: The identification of the role played by a party.

Position_Integer.title: Position_Integer
Position_Integer.description: An integer value, this value is used as a sequential value representing the relative position of an entity within a space such as a time interval.

Quality_String.title: Quality_String
Quality_String.description: The coded identification of the quality of the information.

MeasurementPointID_String.title: MeasurementPointID_String
MeasurementPointID_String.description:
The coded identification of a domain covering a number of related objects, such as metering point, accounting point, etc.

In the ESMP context, it is an authorized issuing office that provides an agreed identification coding scheme for measurement point identification.

AreaID_String.title: AreaID_String
AreaID_String.description:
The coded identification of a domain, i.e. balance area, grid area, etc.

In the ESMP context, it is an authorized issuing office that provides an agreed identification coding scheme for domain identification.

MeasurementUnitKind_String.title: MeasurementUnitKind_String
MeasurementUnitKind_String.description: The coded identification of a unit of measure that is applied to a quantity. The measurement units shall be in compliance with UN/ECE Recommendation 20.

YMDHM_DateTime.title: YMDHM_DateTime
YMDHM_DateTime.description: In ESMP, the date and time is expressed as "YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmZ", which conforms with ISO 8601 UTC time zone. This date and time is without the seconds.

value.description: The date and time as "YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmZ", which conforms with the ISO 8601 UTC time zone.

ESMP_DateTimeInterval.title: ESMP_DateTimeInterval
ESMP_DateTimeInterval.description: This datatype enables to express the start date and time, and the end date and time of a time interval with a specific pattern. This pattern is the YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmZ.

start.description: The start date and time of the interval with a minute resolution.

end.description: The end date and time of the interval with a minute resolution.

BusinessSectorKind_String.title: BusinessSectorKind_String
BusinessSectorKind_String.description: A code indicating the function of the message.

MarketEvaluationPointKind_String.title: MarketEvaluationPointKind_String
MarketEvaluationPointKind_String.description: A code specifying how the energy volumes are treated for settlement for an Accounting Point, such as profiled or non-profiled.
